restaurants.name: noodles and dumplings
restaurants.description: Serving a large selection of noodle, dumpling and wonton dishes, this is the place to get your asian on

restaurants.name: japanese curry
restaurants.description: Various rice bowls, with and without curry. Also known as "Blue place"

restaurants.name: steak house
restaurants.description: Noodle or rice dishes that include steak and porkchop toppings. Served on hot plates. Known as the "Green place"

restaurants.name: amani fusion kitchen
restaurants.description: Dishes from all around Asia, especially known for its Chicken Nanban and Singaporean chicken curry. Known as the "Orange place"

restaurants.name: mediterranean
restaurants.description: Food from all over the Mediterranean, usually involves beef, pork or fish. Many of the dishes are gratined, making this one of the few places at campus you can get cheesy food. Served with rice or macaroni. Menu changes weekly

restaurants.name: breakfast
restaurants.description: A popular place for a nice snack, each price includes a refreshing glass of milk tea

restaurants.name: buffet
restaurants.description: Provides a varied selection of meat, vegetables, fish and more. Perfect place if you're in the mood for everything. Price is based on weight
